1512.title: Batgirl (Barbara Gordon)

15123.content:
(This is what Batgirl looks like; https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl::EH... )

It was a peaceful night in Gotham city (well as peaceful as it could get in a crime ridden city like Gotham). Even though its legendary protector, the Dark Knight had left to fight alongside the Justice League, there was still one to keep the street safe from crime; Batgirl.

She was currently atop an abandon warehouse, her costume consisted of a dark gray suit with yellow utility belt, blue gloves, a black and blue bat-shaped cowl with two holes for eyes with a black with black cape attached to said cowl and a yellow bat logo. She received word that the criminal organization known as Intergang would be getting their hands on several stolen LexCorp inventions and Batgirl was bent on foiling their plans. Suddenly a large white truck arrived on the street below, she observed as thugs brought the stolen cargo inside the warehouse.

Batgirl decided she had seen enough and jumped through the ceiling window. This had caught off the thugs that they didn't have to react before Batgirl threw a couple of smoke bombs. During the confusion, thug who forgot to bring a gun opened one of the boxes in hope of finding something of defending himself. He found a sci-fi looking gun and shot Batgirl. "Hey what was..." She said before she clutched her stomach in pain. She felt like her organs were getting too big for her body. Then she began to grow at a rapid speed. The smoke cleared to revel she was now 15 feet tall and still growing. The thugs not wanting to be around when she finished growth spurt exit the building. Her head rammed her head into the ceiling, she tries to crouching down but that doesn't work. Eventually she grows through the roof until she reached nearly 50 feet tall.

She looked around at her tiny surroundings. "I could use to this," She smiled as she thought of all of the good she could do with her new height. Then she caught a glimpse of the crooks and mischievously grinned, "Well, well, well. What do we have here?" The thugs quickly got into the trunk and drove off. "Oh no you don't" Batgirl she said as she chased after them. Unfortunately in her zeal, she didn't notice the destruction she left in her wake. Her footsteps causing powerful tremors which a lot of damage. The truck she was after drove into a busy street only to crash into a lamp post. She jumped over a street of people and landed on the road, which left deep craters in the ground. "I finally caught you!" She laughed as she took a step the struck and accidently stepped on empty car. She heard this and realize what she had done, "Oops."

This sent the people into a panic as they ran and screamed. "Oh dear," She frowned, Batman wasn't going to be happy about this. "Please don't panic, I'm not her to hurt you." She told the citizens but no one would listen. To make matters worst, stepped on a car and was rolling back and forth. She then loses balance and she felli nto the side of a building that was maybe twice her size. Between the force of her falling, and her weight, the brick walls were no match for the 50 foot girl and they burst inwards. As her arms tore two gouges through the wall, destroying whatever was inside, the rest of her followed as she fell.

She groaned as she got up, sending an assortment of rubble to fall off of her as she did so. There was still some dust in the air and she coughed a bit from it. She sat up and looked around, noticing several wires, and the destroyed telephone poles they belonged too. She sighed and looked around and then gasped. She had crushed that building! People could be injured or worse! Quickly she started to dig through the rubble to look for people. After a few seconds of finding nothing, she picked up what looked like had been the front door. She squinted her eyes and sighed of relief when she saw the “Closed” sign still attached to the window. She then turned her head and saw the streets were empty. "Batman's gonna kill me," she moaned. she started to walk to a place where she wouldn't cause any more trouble.

Then she spotted a little boy, no older than 10. She gently got down on her hands and knees to take a closer look at him. He was scared, not that she could blame him. ."Aww, don't be scared, little buddy." she said sweetly." I won't hurt you." She then grabbed the boy by the waist and brought the bot to her lips and gave him a small peck on the head. "What's your name cutie?" She asked the boy. "Ben," he replied.

"Do you want something to eat?" She asked him. Ben simply nodded. Batgirl placed the boy on her left shoulder and headed to a gas station. reluctantly she tore off the roof of the building before she put Ben back on the ground. She grabbed some food and handed to him. Next saw a hug huge 32 liter bottle of soder big enough for her. Feeling incredibly thirsty she picked up the bottle and gulp down. Batgirl was about to eat but stopped clutch her stomach in agony. "OH drinking was a bad idea." She mumbled. She then let out a long and loud burp that broke every window in a five miles radius and set off every car alarm in the city.

Batgirl, blushed with embarrassment and covered her mouth with one hand and said "Excuse Me!" She was about to cry when she saw Ben hugging her leg. She smiled and place her on her shoulder. This night was a disaster. She caused millions of dollars worth of damage, she wondered how it could get any worst. Then she heard Police sirens as the GCPD arrived. Many of them holding guns pointed right at her. And among them was her own father, James Gordon who was holding a megaphone. "THIS IS THE POLICE, DON'T MOVED!" Batgirl was sweating, wondering what she should do?

Her super hearing alerted her to the sounds of a motorcycle. She turned her head to the left and spot a man driving toward her. 1551.content:
“Another day, another opportunity,” Lucas said to himself as he laid on his bed. It was a fine Saturday morning for the young boy as he was eager to start the day from an exhausting week of school.

Getting up he quickly washed up as he thought what to do for the day. No homework or chores to do, which bode well for him. And his parents weren't around meaning he had the house to himself.

“Watch it you dweeb,” Well almost, the nasally voice of his sister, Tiffany, came as he accidentally bumped to her.

“Well I wouldn't if you weren't so tall,” he replied slyly.

“Well maybe if you weren’t so short,” she replied with a hmf, as she continued to walk.

Lucas just rolled his eyes as he made his way into his room. He was frustrated but he let go of it quickly, realizing that her sister was only getting older and having some form of height complex. Then again he really couldn't tell. After his adventure with his…. more hidden… friends, he did have that near death experience with her. He doubted she recognized him but....he could never tell.

He then recalled the one time he passed by her room while he door was slightly open. She had many boxes of different shapes and sizes around the floor, with her walking around them, over them, and in between them.

Lucas dismissed it as her being weird, and that was saying from where he came. Still that didn't answer the question, what was he supposed to do now?
1551.title: F-ANT-istic adventures commence

choices: He makes it to the front yard with no problems.
Quaking begins, and he fears begin.
15512.content:
Walking back to his room, he jumped into his bed and took a note from under his bed.

It had been a long while since he had visited his friends from the front yard. Strange he was saying that, but it was the truth. Due to certain events he....wasn't too proud of, he was introduced to the large world beneath him.
To make it short, ants had shrunken him and he had the task to stop an exterminator. He called on.

Nevertheless, he could laugh about it now but it was sure as heck that he was terrified when he was facing him.
Regardless, he read the letter that Hova had sent him. Amazed that it was even his size, probably one of Zoc's potions or inventions or something. Still the letter read,

"Dear Lucas,

It has been quite a while since you've visited us. Fugax and the rest of the hive are still thankful for the rock candy you give everyday, yet it's still not the same as you being here. Thus Zoc suggested giving you a small part of the potion that brought you to us." As he read he looked over to the small bottle he had gotten, along with several instructions in how to take it and such. "Please visit whenever you need to. The Hive is thriving and I'm sure the Queen would not mind your visit.

Sincerely,

Hova."

Lucas looked at the bottle once more. "Hova did say, ANYtime...." trying to convince himself it was okay to dive into it. "But then..." He however held back. He really didn't want anyone to worry about him, but the only one to worry about him right now was Tiffany, and knowing her-she was probably leaving her room for the next couple of hours.

He looked at it once more. "Plus...it is Saturday." Convinced that whatever problem there would be, he would be back home before anyone noticed. Reading instructions on the note in the bottle, he slowly got a drop of the potion and dropped in his ear. After that, he only had mere seconds to put it down before the effects started working. Slowly, then rapidly, he felt himself change as the world around him grew. His bed enlarged to gigantic proportions along with all of his belongings.

Quickly he had reached the floor, expansive as an entire plain, only made of wood and gleaming. He smiled, feeling the nostalgia of the adventures he had, and the excitement of making new ones. Walking to the ventilation system, he looked a the mighty grits as he waited for the breeze to begin to carry him outside.

info.description:
As the title implies this is an interactive story about giantesses varying from the genres of Anime to Cartoons, Tv shows to Movies, and everything in between.

For all of you who wanted males to be here, there's plenty of other interactives like those around, apologies. But for those who will contribute I want a few rules:

1. No one liner chapters otherwise I would be force to delete you.

2. Try to use correct grammar

3. Shrinking is allowed as much as growing is

4. If you have a good idea but fear bad writing send me a message and I'll see what I can do about it

Other than that, have fun with the options presented
